PersonalStatement.text: Danielle Ramirez, born on 1978-07-02, is a Female based in South Nathan, Panama. She is Divorced and holds Chilean nationality. Currently working at Thompson, Burton and Juarez.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at Chan, Rodriguez and Harris from 2009 to 2019.
Senior Systems Administrator at Thompson, Burton and Juarez, 2020 to present.
